title: Earth's Early Atmosphere and Oceans - 1st Ed (2016).pdf Gooner
description:
Earth's Early Atmosphere and Oceans and The Origin of Life - 1st Edition (2016).pdf Gooner

Publisher: Springer; 1st ed. 2016 edition (October 9, 2015)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 3319219715
ISBN-13: 978-3319219714

This book provides a comprehensive treatment of the chemical nature of the Earthâ€™s early surface environment and how that led to the origin of life. This includes a detailed discussion of the likely process by which life emerged using as much quantitative information as possible. The emergence of life and the prior surface conditions of the Earth have implications for the evolution of Earthâ€™s surface environment over the following 2-2.5 billion years. The last part of the book discusses how these changes took place and the evidence from the geologic record that supports this particular version of early and evolving conditions
